title: Why Relationships?---Sadhguru Jaggi Vasudev
description:
"The quality of the relationships that you hold in your life largely decides the very quality of the life that you have." --Sadhguru

Yoga, mystic and visionary, Sadhguru is a spiritual master with a difference. His life and work serve as a reminder that yoga is not an esoteric discipline from an outdated past but a contemporary science, vitally relevant to our times.
In a series of intriguing discourses and answers to a variety of life-relevant questions. [b]"In the Presence of the Master"[/b] offers glimpses of Sadhguru&#039;s profound wisdom.

In this volume, Sadhguru provides comprehensive insights into an extremely defining factor in everyone&#039;s life - relationships. Contemplating this subject in all its complexity and nuances. 
&#039;Why Relationships?&#039;draws the bow from the longing to relate with others, to the motives and fundamentals of relationships on various levels, to the key to making relationships truly enjoyable.
